00231    PairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::PairPotentialImpl(Simulation& simulation)
00232     : PairPotential(simulation),
00233       interactionPtr_(0)

00237    * Default constructor.
00238    */
00239    template <class Interaction>
00240    PairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::PairPotentialImpl()
00241     : PairPotential(),
00242       interactionPtr_(0)
00243    {  interactionPtr_ = new Interaction; }

00245    /* 
00246    * Destructor. 
00247    */
00248    template <class Interaction>
00249    PairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::~PairPotentialImpl() 
00250    {
00251       if (interactionPtr_) {
00252          delete interactionPtr_;
00253          interactionPtr_ = 0;
00254       }
00255    }

00257    template <class Interaction>
00258    void PairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::readParam(std::istream& in)
00259    {
00260       readBegin(in,"PairPotential");
00261       bool nextIndent = false;
00262       readParamComposite(in, interaction(), nextIndent);
00263       readPairListParam(in);
00264       readEnd(in);
00265    }

00278    PairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::pairEnergy(double rsq, 
00279                                         int iAtomType, int jAtomType) const
00280    { return interaction().energy(rsq, iAtomType, jAtomType); }

00304    /*
00305    * Increment atomic forces, without calculating energy.
00306    */
00307    template <class Interaction>
00308    void PairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::computeForces()
00309    {  
00310        if (methodId() == 0) {
00311           computeForcesList(); 
00312        } else
00313        if (methodId() == 1) {
00314           computeForcesCell(); 
00315        } else {
00316           computeForcesNSq(); 
00317        }
00318    }
00319 
00320    /*
00321    * Compute total pair energy on all processors.
00322    */
00323    template <class Interaction>
00324    #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00325    void 
00326    PairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::computeEnergy(MPI::Intracomm& communicator)
00327    #else
00328    void PairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::computeEnergy()
00329    #endif
00330    {
00331       // Do nothing (return) if energy is already set.
00332       if (isEnergySet()) return;
00333  
00334       double localEnergy = 0.0; 
00335       if (methodId() == 0) {
00336          localEnergy = energyList(); 
00337       } else 
00338       if (methodId() == 1) {
00339          localEnergy = energyCell(); 
00340       } else {
00341          localEnergy = energyNSq(); 
00342       }
00343 
00344       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00345       double totalEnergy = 0.0; 
00346       communicator.Reduce(&localEnergy, &totalEnergy, 1, 
00347                           MPI::DOUBLE, MPI::SUM, 0);
00348       if (communicator.Get_rank() != 0) {
00349          totalEnergy = 0.0;
00350       }
00351       setEnergy(totalEnergy);
00352       #else
00353       setEnergy(localEnergy);
00354       #endif
00355    }
00356 
00357    /*
00358    * Increment atomic forces and/or pair energy (private).
00359    */
00360    template <class Interaction>
00361    double PairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::energyList()
00362    {
00363       Vector f;
00364       double rsq;
00365       double energy = 0.0;
00366       PairIterator iter;
00367       Atom*  atom0Ptr;
00368       Atom*  atom1Ptr;
00369       int    type0, type1;
00370       if (reverseUpdateFlag()) {
00371          for (pairList_.begin(iter); iter.notEnd(); ++iter) {
00372             iter.getPair(atom0Ptr, atom1Ptr);
00373             assert(!atom0Ptr->isGhost());
00374             type0 = atom0Ptr->typeId();
00375             type1 = atom1Ptr->typeId();
00376             f.subtract(atom0Ptr->position(), atom1Ptr->position());
00377             rsq = f.square();
00378             energy += interactionPtr_->energy(rsq, type0, type1);
00379          }
00380       } else {
00381          for (pairList_.begin(iter); iter.notEnd(); ++iter) {
00382             iter.getPair(atom0Ptr, atom1Ptr);
00383             assert(!atom0Ptr->isGhost());
00384             type0 = atom0Ptr->typeId();
00385             type1 = atom1Ptr->typeId();
00386             f.subtract(atom0Ptr->position(), atom1Ptr->position());
00387             rsq = f.square();
00388             if (!atom1Ptr->isGhost()) {
00389                energy += interactionPtr_->energy(rsq, type0, type1);
00390             } else {
00391                energy += 0.5*interactionPtr_->energy(rsq, type0, type1);
00392             }
00393          }
00394       }
00395       return energy;
00396    }
00397 
00398    /*
00399    * Increment atomic forces and/or pair energy (private).
00400    */
00401    template <class Interaction>
00402    void PairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::computeForcesList()
00403    {
00404       Vector f;
00405       double rsq;
00406       PairIterator iter;
00407       Atom*  atom0Ptr;
00408       Atom*  atom1Ptr;
00409       int    type0, type1;
00410 
00411       if (reverseUpdateFlag()) {
00412 
00413          for (pairList_.begin(iter); iter.notEnd(); ++iter) {
00414             iter.getPair(atom0Ptr, atom1Ptr);
00415             f.subtract(atom0Ptr->position(), atom1Ptr->position());
00416             rsq = f.square();
00417             type0 = atom0Ptr->typeId();
00418             type1 = atom1Ptr->typeId();
00419             f *= interactionPtr_->forceOverR(rsq, type0, type1);
00420             atom0Ptr->force() += f;
00421             atom1Ptr->force() -= f;
00422          }
00423 
00424       } else {
00425 
00426          for (pairList_.begin(iter); iter.notEnd(); ++iter) {
00427             iter.getPair(atom0Ptr, atom1Ptr);
00428             f.subtract(atom0Ptr->position(), atom1Ptr->position());
00429             rsq = f.square();
00430             type0 = atom0Ptr->typeId();
00431             type1 = atom1Ptr->typeId();
00432             f *= interactionPtr_->forceOverR(rsq, type0, type1);
00433             atom0Ptr->force() += f;
00434             if (!atom1Ptr->isGhost()) {
00435                atom1Ptr->force() -= f;
00436             }
00437          }
00438 
00439       }
00440    }
00441 
00442    /*
00443    * Increment atomic forces and/or pair energy (private).
00444    */
00445    template <class Interaction>
00446    double PairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::energyCell()
00447    {
00448       // Find all neighbors (cell list)
00449       Cell::NeighborArray neighbors;
00450       Vector f;
00451       double rsq;
00452       double energy = 0.0;
00453       Atom*  atomPtr0;
00454       Atom*  atomPtr1;
00455       const Cell*  cellPtr;
00456       int    type0, type1, na, nn, i, j;
00457 
00458       // Iterate over linked list of local cells.
00459       cellPtr = cellList_.begin();
00460       while (cellPtr) {
00461          cellPtr->getNeighbors(neighbors, reverseUpdateFlag());
00462          na = cellPtr->nAtom();
00463          nn = neighbors.size();
00464          for (i = 0; i < na; ++i) {
00465             atomPtr0 = neighbors[i];
00466             type0 = atomPtr0->typeId();
00467 
00468             // Loop over atoms in this cell
00469             for (j = 0; j < na; ++j) {
00470                atomPtr1 = neighbors[j];
00471                type1 = atomPtr1->typeId();
00472                if (atomPtr1 > atomPtr0) {
00473                   f.subtract(atomPtr0->position(), atomPtr1->position());
00474                   rsq = f.square();
00475                   energy += interactionPtr_->energy(rsq, type0, type1);
00476                }
00477             }
00478 
00479             // Loop over atoms in neighboring cells.
00480             if (reverseUpdateFlag()) {
00481                for (j = na; j < nn; ++j) {
00482                   atomPtr1 = neighbors[j];
00483                   type1 = atomPtr1->typeId();
00484                   f.subtract(atomPtr0->position(), atomPtr1->position());
00485                   rsq = f.square();
00486                   energy += interactionPtr_->energy(rsq, type0, type1);
00487                }
00488             } else {
00489                for (j = na; j < nn; ++j) {
00490                   atomPtr1 = neighbors[j];
00491                   type1 = atomPtr1->typeId();
00492                   f.subtract(atomPtr0->position(), atomPtr1->position());
00493                   rsq = f.square();
00494                   if (!atomPtr1->isGhost()) {
00495                      energy += interactionPtr_->energy(rsq, type0, type1);
00496                   } else {
00497                      energy += 0.5*interactionPtr_->energy(rsq, type0, type1);
00498                   }
00499                }
00500             }
00501 
00502          }
00503          cellPtr = cellPtr->nextCellPtr();
00504       } // while (cellPtr) 
00505       return energy;
00506    }
00507 
00508    /*
00509    * Increment atomic forces using Cell List (private).
00510    */
00511    template <class Interaction>
00512    void PairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::computeForcesCell()
00513    {
00514       // Find all neighbors (cell list)
00515       Cell::NeighborArray neighbors;
00516       Vector f;
00517       double rsq;
00518       Atom*  atomPtr0;
00519       Atom*  atomPtr1;
00520       const Cell* cellPtr;
00521       int    type0, type1, na, nn, i, j;
00522 
00523       // Iterate over local cells.
00524       cellPtr = cellList_.begin();
00525       while (cellPtr) {
00526          cellPtr->getNeighbors(neighbors);
00527          na = cellPtr->nAtom();
00528          nn = neighbors.size();
00529          for (i = 0; i < na; ++i) {
00530             atomPtr0 = neighbors[i];
00531             type0 = atomPtr0->typeId();
00532             // Loop over atoms in this cell
00533             for (j = 0; j < na; ++j) {
00534                atomPtr1 = neighbors[j];
00535                type1 = atomPtr1->typeId();
00536                if (atomPtr1 > atomPtr0) {
00537                   f.subtract(atomPtr0->position(), atomPtr1->position());
00538                   rsq = f.square();
00539                   f *= interactionPtr_->forceOverR(rsq, type0, type1);
00540                   atomPtr0->force() += f;
00541                   atomPtr1->force() -= f;
00542                }
00543             }
00544 
00545             // Loop over atoms in neighboring cells.
00546             if (reverseUpdateFlag()) {
00547                for (j = na; j < nn; ++j) {
00548                   atomPtr1 = neighbors[j];
00549                   type1 = atomPtr1->typeId();
00550                   f.subtract(atomPtr0->position(), atomPtr1->position());
00551                   rsq = f.square();
00552                   f *= interactionPtr_->forceOverR(rsq, type0, type1);
00553                   atomPtr0->force() += f;
00554                   atomPtr1->force() -= f;
00555                }
00556             } else {
00557                for (j = na; j < nn; ++j) {
00558                   atomPtr1 = neighbors[j];
00559                   type1 = atomPtr1->typeId();
00560                   f.subtract(atomPtr0->position(), atomPtr1->position());
00561                   rsq = f.square();
00562                   f *= interactionPtr_->forceOverR(rsq, type0, type1);
00563                   atomPtr0->force() += f;
00564                   if (!atomPtr1->isGhost()) {
00565                      atomPtr1->force() -= f;
00566                   }
00567                }
00568             }
00569 
00570          }
00571          cellPtr = cellPtr->nextCellPtr();
00572       } // while (cellPtr) 
00573    }
00574 
00575    /*
00576    * Increment atomic forces and/or pair energy (private).
00577    */
00578    template <class Interaction>
00579    double PairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::energyNSq()
00580    {
00581       Vector f;
00582       double rsq;
00583       double energy = 0.0;
00584       AtomIterator  atomIter0, atomIter1;
00585       GhostIterator ghostIter;
00586       int id0, id1, type0, type1;
00587 
00588       // Iterate over local atom 0
00589       storage().begin(atomIter0);
00590       for ( ; atomIter0.notEnd(); ++atomIter0) {
00591          id0 = atomIter0->id();
00592          type0 = atomIter0->typeId();
00593 
00594          // Iterate over local atom 1
00595          storage().begin(atomIter1);
00596          for ( ; atomIter1.notEnd(); ++atomIter1) {
00597             id1 = atomIter1->id();
00598             if (id0 < id1) {
00599                if (!atomIter0->mask().isMasked(id1)) {
00600                   f.subtract(atomIter0->position(), atomIter1->position());
00601                   rsq = f.square();
00602                   type1 = atomIter1->typeId();
00603                   energy += interactionPtr_->energy(rsq, type0, type1);
00604                }
00605             }
00606          }
00607 
00608          // Iterate over ghost atoms
00609          storage().begin(ghostIter);
00610          if (reverseUpdateFlag()) {
00611             for ( ; ghostIter.notEnd(); ++ghostIter) {
00612                id1 = ghostIter->id();
00613                if (id0 < id1) {
00614                   if (!atomIter0->mask().isMasked(id1)) {
00615                      f.subtract(atomIter0->position(), ghostIter->position());
00616                      rsq = f.square();
00617                      type1 = ghostIter->typeId();
00618                      energy += interactionPtr_->energy(rsq, type0, type1);
00619                   }
00620                }
00621             }
00622          } else {
00623             for ( ; ghostIter.notEnd(); ++ghostIter) {
00624                id1 = ghostIter->id();
00625                if (!atomIter0->mask().isMasked(id1)) {
00626                   f.subtract(atomIter0->position(), ghostIter->position());
00627                   rsq = f.square();
00628                   type1 = ghostIter->typeId();
00629                   energy += 0.5*interactionPtr_->energy(rsq, type0, type1);
00630                }
00631             }
00632          }
00633 
00634       }
00635       return energy;
00636    }
00637 
00638    /*
00639    * Increment atomic forces and/or pair energy (private).
00640    */
00641    template <class Interaction>
00642    void PairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::computeForcesNSq()
00643    {
00644       Vector f;
00645       double rsq;
00646       AtomIterator  atomIter0, atomIter1;
00647       GhostIterator ghostIter;
00648       int           type0, type1, id0, id1;
00649 
00650       // Iterate over atom 0
00651       storage().begin(atomIter0);
00652       for ( ; atomIter0.notEnd(); ++atomIter0) {
00653          id0 = atomIter0->id();
00654          type0 = atomIter0->typeId();
00655 
00656          // Iterate over local atom 1
00657          storage().begin(atomIter1);
00658          for ( ; atomIter1.notEnd(); ++atomIter1) {
00659             id1 = atomIter1->id();
00660             if (id0 < id1) {
00661                if (!atomIter0->mask().isMasked(id1)) {
00662                   // Set f = r0 - r1, separation between atoms
00663                   f.subtract(atomIter0->position(), atomIter1->position());
00664                   rsq = f.square();
00665                   type1 = atomIter1->typeId();
00666                   // Set vector force = (r0-r1)*(forceOverR)
00667                   f *= interactionPtr_->forceOverR(rsq, type0, type1);
00668                   atomIter0->force() += f;
00669                   atomIter1->force() -= f;
00670                }
00671             }
00672          }
00673 
00674          // Iterate over ghosts
00675          storage().begin(ghostIter);
00676          if (reverseUpdateFlag()) {
00677 
00678             for ( ; ghostIter.notEnd(); ++ghostIter) {
00679                id1 = ghostIter->id();
00680                if (id0 < id1) {
00681                   if (!atomIter0->mask().isMasked(id1)) {
00682                      // Set f = r0 - r1, separation between atoms
00683                      f.subtract(atomIter0->position(), ghostIter->position());
00684                      rsq = f.square();
00685                      type1 = ghostIter->typeId();
00686                      // force = (r0-r1)*(forceOverR)
00687                      f *= interactionPtr_->forceOverR(rsq, type0, type1);
00688                      atomIter0->force() += f;
00689                      ghostIter->force() -= f;
00690                      // Note: If reverseUpdateFlag, increment ghost force 
00691                   }
00692                }
00693             }
00694 
00695          } else {
00696 
00697             for ( ; ghostIter.notEnd(); ++ghostIter) {
00698                id1 = ghostIter->id();
00699                if (!atomIter0->mask().isMasked(id1)) {
00700                   // Set f = r0 - r1, separation between atoms
00701                   f.subtract(atomIter0->position(), ghostIter->position());
00702                   rsq = f.square();
00703                   type1 = ghostIter->typeId();
00704                   // force = (r0-r1)*(forceOverR)
00705                   f *= interactionPtr_->forceOverR(rsq, type0, type1);
00706                   atomIter0->force() += f;
00707                   // Note: If !reverseUpdateFlag, do not increment ghost force 
00708                }
00709             }
00710 
00711          }
00712 
00713       }
00714    }
00715 
00716    /*
00717    * Compute total pair stress (Call on all processors).
00718    */
00719    template <class Interaction>
00720    #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00721    void PairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::computeStress(MPI::Intracomm& communicator)
00722    #else
00723    void PairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::computeStress()
00724    #endif
00725    {
00726       // Do nothing if stress is already set.
00727       if (isStressSet()) return;
00728  
00729       Tensor localStress;
00730       Vector dr;
00731       Vector f;
00732       double rsq, forceOverR;
00733       PairIterator iter;
00734       Atom*  atom0Ptr;
00735       Atom*  atom1Ptr;
00736       int    type0, type1;
00737 
00738       localStress.zero();
00739       if (reverseUpdateFlag()) {
00740 
00741          for (pairList_.begin(iter); iter.notEnd(); ++iter) {
00742             iter.getPair(atom0Ptr, atom1Ptr);
00743             dr.subtract(atom0Ptr->position(), atom1Ptr->position());
00744             rsq = dr.square();
00745             type0 = atom0Ptr->typeId();
00746             type1 = atom1Ptr->typeId();
00747             f = dr;
00748             f *= interactionPtr_->forceOverR(rsq, type0, type1);
00749             incrementPairStress(f, dr, localStress);
00750          }
00751 
00752       } else {
00753 
00754          for (pairList_.begin(iter); iter.notEnd(); ++iter) {
00755             iter.getPair(atom0Ptr, atom1Ptr);
00756             dr.subtract(atom0Ptr->position(), atom1Ptr->position());
00757             rsq = dr.square();
00758             type0 = atom0Ptr->typeId();
00759             type1 = atom1Ptr->typeId();
00760             f = dr;
00761             forceOverR = interactionPtr_->forceOverR(rsq, type0, type1);
00762             assert(!atom0Ptr->isGhost());
00763             if (atom1Ptr->isGhost()) {
00764                forceOverR *= 0.5;
00765             }
00766             f *= forceOverR;
00767             incrementPairStress(f, dr, localStress);
00768          }
00769 
00770       }
00771 
00772       // Normalize by volume 
00773       localStress /= boundary().volume();
00774 
00775       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00776       Tensor totalStress;
00777       communicator.Reduce(&localStress(0,0), &totalStress(0,0), 
00778                           Dimension*Dimension, MPI::DOUBLE, MPI::SUM, 0);
00779       if (communicator.Get_rank() != 0) {
00780          totalStress.zero();
00781       }
00782       setStress(totalStress);
00783       #else
00784       setStress(localStress);
00785       #endif
00786 
00787    }
00788 
00789    /*
00790    * Compute total pair stress (Call on all processors).
00791    */
00792    template <class Interaction>
00793    #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00794    void PairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::computeForcesAndStress(MPI::Intracomm& communicator)
00795    #else
00796    void PairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::computeForcesAndStress()
00797    #endif
00798    {
00799       // If stress is already set, just calculate forces
00800       if (isStressSet()) {
00801          computeForcesList();
00802          return;
00803       }
00804  
00805       Tensor localStress;
00806       Vector dr;
00807       Vector f;
00808       double rsq, forceOverR;
00809       PairIterator iter;
00810       Atom*  atom0Ptr;
00811       Atom*  atom1Ptr;
00812       int    type0, type1;
00813 
00814       localStress.zero();
00815       if (reverseUpdateFlag()) {
00816 
00817          for (pairList_.begin(iter); iter.notEnd(); ++iter) {
00818             iter.getPair(atom0Ptr, atom1Ptr);
00819             dr.subtract(atom0Ptr->position(), atom1Ptr->position());
00820             rsq = dr.square();
00821             type0 = atom0Ptr->typeId();
00822             type1 = atom1Ptr->typeId();
00823             f = dr;
00824             f *= interactionPtr_->forceOverR(rsq, type0, type1);
00825             assert(!atom0Ptr->isGhost());
00826             atom0Ptr->force() += f;
00827             atom1Ptr->force() -= f;
00828             incrementPairStress(f, dr, localStress);
00829          }
00830 
00831       } else {
00832 
00833          for (pairList_.begin(iter); iter.notEnd(); ++iter) {
00834             iter.getPair(atom0Ptr, atom1Ptr);
00835             dr.subtract(atom0Ptr->position(), atom1Ptr->position());
00836             rsq = dr.square();
00837             type0 = atom0Ptr->typeId();
00838             type1 = atom1Ptr->typeId();
00839             f  = dr;
00840             f *= interactionPtr_->forceOverR(rsq, type0, type1);
00841             assert(!atom0Ptr->isGhost());
00842             atom0Ptr->force() += f;
00843             if (!atom1Ptr->isGhost()) {
00844                atom1Ptr->force() -= f;
00845                incrementPairStress(f, dr, localStress);
00846             } else { // if atom 1 is a ghost
00847                f *= 0.5;
00848                incrementPairStress(f, dr, localStress);
00849             }
00850          }
00851 
00852       }
00853 
00854       // Normalize by volume 
00855       localStress /= boundary().volume();
00856 
00857       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00858       Tensor totalStress;
00859       communicator.Reduce(&localStress(0,0), &totalStress(0,0), 
00860                           Dimension*Dimension, MPI::DOUBLE, MPI::SUM, 0);
00861       if (communicator.Get_rank() != 0) {
00862          totalStress.zero();
00863       }
00864       setStress(totalStress);
00865       #else
00866       setStress(localStress);
00867       #endif
00868 
00869    }
00870 
00871 }
00872 #endif
Generated on Wed Aug 29 2012 08:57:57 for Simpatico by  1.7.3
